property.name: templeton.hive.extra.files
property.description: The resources in this list will be localized to the node running LaunchMapper and added to HADOOP_CLASSPTH before launching 'hive' command. If the path /foo/bar is a directory, the contents of the the entire dir will be localized and ./foo/* will be added to HADOOP_CLASSPATH. Note that since classpath path processing does not recurse into subdirectories, the paths in this property may be overlapping. In the example above, "./tez-site.xml:./tez-client/*:./lib/*" will be added to HADOOP_CLASSPATH. This can be used to specify config files, Tez artifacts, etc. This will be sent -files option of hadoop jar command thus each path is interpreted by Generic Option Parser. It can be local or hdfs path.
